lines.text: Everyone in the crowd goes like, "Oh, what!" The room gets really loud and really quiet as she's like... (snarls)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (grunts) And jumps at you, like a feral beast.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Once again, I know, this dice is rolling really well, but it's still seven points of bludgeoning damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And that bonus action third strike is going to be only a 14 to hit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You get advantage, because she's reckless attacking.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Still holding back on your rage?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I push her and I get really close to her and I say: Is that all you got?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you using your action to shove her or are you using your action to make an intimidation check?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No, I'm just saying that to her and then I push her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, are you doing damage with the push or just pushing her?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Double check something here real fast.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you want to push her five feet away with your push or knock her prone?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Just push her five feet away.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can move in closer, if you want to.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, oh yeah, so I can attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So the second time you move forward, and you try and slap her again?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's going to be a 24 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take six points of bludgeoning damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you take another six points bludgeoning damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is some weird sick thing.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I just shove her off onto the ground.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just pull her off onto the ground?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Slamming her onto the ground, doing two points of damage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Onto the ground now, arms and legs are curled up in a defensive position, almost like a spider knocked onto its back, what are you doing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, what are you doing for the second attack?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm going to kick her in her side.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty, is that your turn?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She rolled a 16, they both got even, let me see what--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is this like a game of War, and then you go again?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It says it's athletics versus athletics.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, so I would like to try, from the ground, as she's going down, to grab her wrists and try to bring her close to me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you're going to grapple her?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Is this a grapple you're trying to? You don't have advantage on this because she didn't reckless attack on you.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: So what do I add to that, then?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you're trying to grapple her? Athletics check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are the ground, you reach up, and you have her held to you with your first attack.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god, Yasha's so hardcore.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Use your strength for it, if you want to.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Everyone's like leaning in and going, what is happening? She's... (pants)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (pants) It's her turn and she steps back, and steps back to about 10 feet away from you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She's going to lose her rage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She would have to not attack her this round, to have the rage dropped.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But she can be frightened while she's raging?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, actually, let me double check that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, I will say, because she is a frenzy barbarian, she is immune to frightened while raging.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's going to be a 21 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So six points of bludgeoning And an 11, miss?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I take it you used your turn on your turn to get up, right?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, I don't have advantage, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, she didn't do reckless this turn.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You could go reckless, if you want it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, yeah, I'm going to go reckless.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Punch her in her stomach, but I'm going to pull the punch but the crowd won't notice that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Maybe she's just trying to make Fjord feel better?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You pulled the one punch back and she's like-- (pants)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: And then I smack her again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Definitely hits, what do you do?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: So she's in front of me?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: So I would like to run up against the bars-- (Laura gasps) and push her up against the wall.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just make a strength check for me, if you don't mind.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's okay, she didn't get good, either.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can use your second attack if you want to try again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Never mind. So the second one is?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Wait, but why did I just roll twice?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Because she was reckless attacking you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So for the first one was,

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I think the first one was a four, so, seven.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm going to shove her back into the wall again, see if I can do that.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, so I'm going to shove her up against the wall and I'm going to scream at her, show me why you're the fucking champion! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Second head butt, it's going to be a...

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm going to try to shove her off of me.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: So I'd like to shove her off of me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Two natural ones in a row on her.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: And just shove her off and throw her against the wall.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you push her this way into the bars again on this end?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is the saddest pit fight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you moving in to close the gap?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: My voice is not fully there, so I like tried doing the yelling and I'm like, I'm just stick to whispering.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Another two damage, as you rush forward, and what is this attack?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm just going to push her again into the bars.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, another six points of bludgeoning damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And then another six points of bludgeoning damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your vision's starting to go a little...

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, wait, why am I roll-- oh, reckless.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, she was reckless, so you have advantage on her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, that hits, two damage.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I was thinking of something, but I don't want to do that.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm just going to take the bottom of my boot and I'm going to just push her up against the wall.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, yeah, just not really any damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Her turn, she's going to attempt to punch right underneath where the knee joint is to see if she can--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: And I just say, finish it, champion.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And that is going to be a 15 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That will hit, another six points of bludgeoning damage.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: As she hits me, bloodied, just a smile of relief before being knocked unconscious.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Storms through the gates, up the stairs, and out of the venue.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She's going to give up fighting.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I jog over to the open bars, since I'm down there anyway, and just like--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The medic's already rushed over and you heal...

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I think, um, what is the thing-- oh, no, that's only if you're raging.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We agreed to have our asses kicked.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That was the conversation when you all were alone?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you intentionally trying to deceive her?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: She was a champion, for sure.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're going to have to have a talk about that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, we're going to talk about that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yasha comes out of our gate, yeah?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Other folks are starting to gather.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: She is the champion for a reason.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It looked like it, it looked--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I think I gave it my best.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Felt like a lot of whispering, Was just all like a lot of like...

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, I think I was just off, I don't know, because it just wasn't my fight.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I can pay you guys back.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know you tried your hardest, it's not--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you feel good about the fight?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's kind of what concerns me.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I enjoy the feeling of being knocked unconscious, but it seemed like you really,

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Did you figure out what you were trying to figure out in there?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let's actually, let's go to, um-- let's go to our bar and get like a round of mai tais, yeah?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, before Yasha even makes it eight or nine steps from where she is, Caleb's already got two large flagons from the bar.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Holds her gaze for a second and says, I get it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Like, I want a round of mai tais.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, we need the spring break mai tais.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right, 100 of yours and 100 of hers, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct, so that would mean you would get...

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I just split whatever I get back with Beauregard.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you get your 100 back, so 200 back, plus, it would be an additional 400 you get on top of that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 400, okay, so I split, so that's 600 total? You get 300.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, sorry, you got 400 total on that, so it was 200 each of you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So it's a total of 310 that you've made on top of that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You should wail on old dudes more often.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The lesson is, punch old men.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And he gets a payout on the side, too, from somebody else.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hey man, my dad did it for a long time.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Bye, man, I'm just going to go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For Jester, you put 120 on Beau, So you get the 120 back, plus the, uh, what was the extra amount I told you it was the--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: One plus two plus two plus one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right, it was the double down, so you got 240.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, okay, so I just, oh, okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It was a one to one thing, okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll double check when I have time over the break, if need be.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What have you been doing, Nott?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Cy's Tops, or what's it called?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, go ahead and roll a--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not like the highest end, but it is a good array and you have the pick of the litter.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I want a top hat for myself.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What else they got, they got any of those weird Bavarian things?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, no, they do have, um...

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You know, the little feather thing, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are wide-brimmed riding hats, there are...

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll get a hat for everybody.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you get to decide which hats you got.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How much are you drinking right now?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, plenty, I'm just walking down the aisles drinkin', tryin' on hats.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Dance of the Sugar Plum Fairy is going on.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (humming Dance of the Sugar Plum Fairy)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Get a little yarmulke for Beau. (chuckles) I don't know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys wander outside the butchery, and catch up with Nott, who is clutching a pile of hats.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Did you buy those? All those hats?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Where did you find a place that was open selling hats?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I got you, um, well, your horns are an issue.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's got to be a little teeny hat if you're going to--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, I got you just one of those tiny little doll hats that you put on with a little strap.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's so cute, I love it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's weird with this head to get this sitting right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It kind of suits you in a weird way.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It goes with your very-- Yeah, you have a very vertical aesthetic.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't really see the point.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yasha, I got you a yellow beanie.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If you flip it down, it'll be more your style.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: If I flip it down, it'll be sad.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter) I got you a baseball cap, or the Zemnian equivalent.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I went to Rexxentrum and all I got was this--

lines.name: SAM

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I would've thought like a cowboy hat.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did she just run in next door?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is anyone out in the street?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I just throw that one back in through the window.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And that's where we'll end this holiday episode. (laughs)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Also known as the Kentucky Derby.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: ♪ I see your true colors shining through ♪

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Way to Trent Reznor this event.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, yeah! Yeah, I dig it, I dig it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is the Stormlord just Johnny Cash?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty, well, we come back in 2020.

lines.text: So we got a lot to look forward to.
